snippet.title: A Tale in the Desert: Tale 9 - Part 1 - Welcome Island (ATitD)
snippet.description:
A Tale in the Desert is a crafting, basebuilding, skill-based mmo with no combat.  Players can cooperate or compete against each other in various puzzles and challenges.

#Disclosure: A review copy was provided by the dev/pub for this playthrough

====================
RESOURCES FOR TALE 9
====================

◙ #ATitD Website: http://www.desert-nomad.com
◙ Free Download (PC, Mac, Linux): https://www.desert-nomad.com/Download 
◙ Discord: http://discord.gg/pYQrHsy
◙ Wiki: https://atitd.wiki
